I have already explained how to build an intranet and the benefits.

sAn intranet is a great resource for a company, and WordPress can help save time and money. But, above all, if you are not an expert, the most important thing is to use a good WordPress theme specific to an intranet website.

Below, there is a list of WordPress intranet themes that can help you create your intranet website. For now, there are only four of them because it’s not simple to find a good theme created specifically for intranets or extranets.

Woffice – Intranet/Extranet WordPress theme

Woffice is the first theme designed specifically to build an intranet (or an extranet) with WordPress. It not only contains all the features and plugins that your intranet needs – but it is also a multipurpose WordPress theme that provides hundreds of wonderful features such as calendars, project and task assignment, private messaging, file sharing, polls, member directory.

Woffice also contains Premium plugins – so you can save not only your time but also your money. In addition, it is compatible with dozens of great plugins that can allow you to add more features to your intranet.

Woffice is a fully responsive theme. It is also translation-ready and has already been translated into more than 10 languages!

At the moment, Woffice has more than 1900 happy customers, highly satisfied with the design, features, periodical improvements and great customer care.

Learn more about Woffice.

Alliance | Intranet & Extranet WordPress theme

If for some reason you don’t like Woffice, Alliance is another WordPress theme designed for intranets. It has fewer features than Woffice but is still a good enough choice.

Alliance has a responsive layout and a flat design. Some of the better features provided by this theme are Wiki, Polls, Corporate timeline, and Infographic elements.

Thrive – Intranet & Community WordPress theme

Thrive is a good hybrid between an intranet and a community theme.

It is compatible with BuddyPress, bbPress and their extensions, such as BuddyDrive and BuddyDocs. At the same time, it allows the project, poll and calendar management.

BuddyApp – Mobile First Community WordPress theme

Another great hybrid is BuddyApp. It has a modern design and is a great choice for your community. It is also good for your intranet.

The primary advantage of this theme is a very responsive layout. It is also translation-ready and compatible with WPML and many others plugins.

Wrap Up

There are numerous themes on the market, meant for different uses, with some big names stealing the show.

Themeforest is a great place to find your theme.
